name: Rejuvenation the Story
description:
A lone hero is coming to an end of their journey to find the lost shards of the Dew Drop Crystal. Can our hero find the remaining pieces to restore the land back to what it was? Play this short 20 minute game to find out how the story ends. 

This game was made for the IGMC rebirth Game Jam.

Made with RPG Maker MV

  • All hand drawn artwork
  • Immersive Music
  • Short game
  • Front View Battle system

Use a mouse, keyboard, or gamepad to play through the game. WASD is also supported within the options.

DJ990J - Aries - Casper Gaming - Ellya - Galv - Masked - Moghunter - SumRndmDde - Tale - Terrax - Yanfly - Yoji Ojima

Feel free to rate and leave a comment! :D

Please and thank you!
